articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Welcome to the Financial Technology & Data Analytics Blog! This website hosts the write up of my personal FinTech and Analytics projects as well as various courseworks while pursuing my professional postgraduate degree of [Master of Information Technology in Business](https://scis.smu.edu.sg/master-it-business/financial-technology-and-analytics-track/curriculum) from the [School of Computing and Information Systems](https://scis.smu.edu.sg/), Singapore Management University.  _- Archie Dolit_
